entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
